title: Remove reminder time configuration from onboarding and plan settings

requirements.text: Remove the time windows selection step (step 4) from the onboarding flow, updating the step indicator to show 4 steps instead of 5 and adjusting step navigation accordingly
acceptanceCriteria: Onboarding flow progresses directly from Preferred Tools step to Reset Plan step
Step indicator displays 4 steps total instead of 5
Step numbering remains sequential (1: Goal Focus, 2: Escalation Patterns, 3: Preferred Tools, 4: Reset Plan)
TimeWindowsStep component is no longer rendered in the onboarding flow

requirements.text: Remove time window data fields from the onboarding state management hook, eliminating storage and submission of morning/midday/evening time preferences
acceptanceCriteria: useOnboarding hook no longer tracks timeWindows state
Onboarding completion does not send time window data to backend
State object only contains goalFocus, escalationPatterns, preferredTools, and resetPlanSteps

requirements.text: Remove the RemindersConfig component from the Plan page, eliminating the reminders configuration card entirely
acceptanceCriteria: RemindersConfig component is not rendered on the Plan page
Plan page displays only Reset Sequence, Tool Preferences, and Daily Routines sections
No UI elements related to reminder time configuration remain visible

requirements.text: Remove timeWindows fields from the backend UserProfile type and eliminate all storage, retrieval, and update logic for reminder time preferences
acceptanceCriteria: UserProfile type definition no longer includes morningTime, middayTime, or eveningTime fields
Backend functions do not accept or process time window parameters
Existing user data migration handles removal of deprecated time window fields gracefully

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts or other immutable authentication hooks
Maintain single-actor architecture in backend with all logic in main.mo
Preserve existing onboarding flow functionality for remaining steps
Do not remove weekly review reminder functionality if it exists independently of time windows
nonGoals: Removing all reminder functionality (only time-specific reminders are being removed)
Changing the Reset Plan step content or structure
Modifying other plan configuration options beyond reminders
